bow: mommit where do you cut corners when there are just not enough hours in the day long story short have kids husband and roommate of my kids are special needs my husband is an epileptic who also works 13 hours day and my roommate suffered an injury at work that left him with broken arms screws and plates and everything else in his elbows my kids are 10 and months no need to really explain what goes into being mom you guys already know my husband is on meds that make him tired and when seizure is coming on he is basically useless also after seizure he weak and shaky and there not much we can do until it just totally passes my roommate is in mechanical brace double casts has insurance that wo cover in home nursing and his sole caregiver that means feed him dispense his meds bathe him and yes even wipe his butt on top of that he was his 96 year old grandmother only assistant her house burned down few months ago and she is in assisted living at the moment hold her power of attorney since the roommate broke his arms at the moment there are people semi or fully dependent on me the only help have is friend that sits with the kids for about hours twice week so that can devote myself to cleaning and get shower needless to say there are not enough hours in the day the house is dirty really dirty weeks behind in clearing permits at work could potentially get my business shut down have cooked real meal in over week nor have eaten one was so tired last night that nearly gave my son my roommate morphine and nearly gave my roommate my son antipsychotics getting my kids dressed for school this morning involved digging through the dirty clothes with bottle of febreze because simply did get to laundry ca do this there simply is enough time in the day even if cut out sleeping which fuck it pretty much have already my ten year old is helping as much as she can but not going to put too much on her my seven year old is schizophrenic literally that the diagnosis and my year old has cystic fibrosis variant so they are less than no help not that can blame them it just the way it is what the hell can cut out just to save some more time already feeding all of us out of the microwave off of paper plates at that have asked every single person know for help fat lot of good that did me and pretty sure that at some point pretty soon just going to fall down on the floor and sleep whether or not can afford to at that moment edit thank you guys so much for the suggestions and good deal of them will be used people at my husband work donated vacation days and he has solid week off to help me can ask what state you are in come by and do some laundry or prep some meals for you in mi and even if you ca help just the fact that someone offers means lot to me most of my friends ca be bothered to take even an hour appreciate it you need help you poor thing wish could take you on spa day aside from hiring someone my suggestion would be to enlist the children assign everyone and over at least age appropriate chore they can take off of your plate my year old likes to put away silverware and dishes she can reach my year old sweeps they both loves cleaning glass with windex your 10 year old can help with the wee ones there simply is enough time to do everything so you just have to prioritize what needs to be done most oh nj here sorry that you are going through so much right now the bright side is that there is an end in sight at least where your roommate is concerned like to assume that he will be big help to you once he is able good luck just saw the part about how your 10 year old is already helping and the two that are special needs what area do you live in maybe you can enlist the moms of reddit for some assistance it sounds like you re completely stressed out if you are anywhere near me would volunteer some of my time what area are you in other than that can just say do one thing at time no one can do everything all at once whatever the most pressing task is focus on that until finished and move on think the hard part in your case is going to be deciding what makes task pressing your kids might think their wants are more important than everything else but you will have to get that work stuff done somehow assuming money is tight so paying for help is an option maybe look for mother helper did that for while when was younger young teen to be around and kind of learn the ropes of running household someone that looking to be in the healthcare or childcare industry might be willing to do some volunteer or cheap work to get some experience good luck well am officially ashamed of myself for complaining about the amount of laundry need to do honestly think you need help surely your situation qualifies for some assistance from the county in the form of home health nurse or aid if not can you hire maid couple times month to do the deep cleaning try this sub reddit maybe someone in your area can give you hand http www reddit com assistance or http www reddit com randomkindness oh he owes me some help and he knows it try not to mention it right now because do want to make him feel even worse but when he gets the casts off and can at least use one hand he going to be using it to help out look into crock pot cooking and soups chilis it getting cold where am so cook ton of dump and forget meals dump bunch of stuff into big pot or crock pot in the morning set it on medium or low and its ready by dinner it will probably be healthier than microwave food eating unhealthy is probably affecting everyone does your roommate have anyone else they could ask seriously it is very unfair to put more on top of what you are going through sure your 10 yr old is big help but is there nothing the other older ones can do help sort laundry into colors help start load of laundry grab the load from the dryer mate socks anything you need help if you can think of little tiny job they can handle it is still less for you to do make sure everyone that can is rinsing their own dishes putting their own clothes in to the dirty laundry plastic cups plates dont forget you all are family one big team and team can only function correctly if everyone works together understand your kids have disabilities but that does not mean they are exempt from all responsibility right could be wrong dunno have you thought about putting your business on hold and getting some government assistance it sounds like you about to loose your mind what good would that be for all of the people you are taking care of really sorry you have such massive amount of stress to parrot everyone else here you definitely need some help do you have family member mil mom sister brother etc etc etc that could come in and possibly stay with you near you for at least little while until say your roommate has healed are you involved with church group that you could reach out to if you re not religious would recommend looking for local unitarian universalist group my experience has been that they are an amazing group of people and you might be able to find help through them as far as managing things within your home ve found that my four year loves helping when he gets to use the machinery put the tablet in the dishwasher amp turn it on sort the clothes to be washed put the detergent in the washing machine and turn it on take the clothes out of the dryer etc if your older kids could do the main parts ie rinsing prewashing the dishes putting the clothes in the washer etc your smaller ones could get engaged with the button pressing etc and it might help give you break get caught up also know you do want to put too much on your 10 year old but maybe she could start cooking basic meals with supervision obviously but you could maybe put your feet up for few minutes while you instruct her on what to do so sorry that you have it so rough wish were close enough to help where the hell is your roommate family surely he has someone besides his grandma he has parents and probably friends ca believe you managed to respond with anything other than man that is balls help if did have my hands so full already better make some phone calls bro are you acquainted with any of your neighbors maybe one or more of them could bring some meals over or take the kids off your hands for few hours or even help with the roommate honestly do know how you have already taken off running down the street half naked and screaming this will sound weird bad but are you at all religious can you talk to clergy member or some kind of women group that can help after had my son had some massive complications died on the table but got better the relief society of the lds ward we live in swooped in and completely cleaned my house did all our laundry and even offered to cook meal because was completely incapacitated maybe they can add you to some kind of rotation schedule to give you break or at least bring in some home cooked meals someone get this lady freaking cape ll look into it am religious but not deeply and have bothered to join church add that to the list of things am currently kicking myself for there is moms group that part of and admit have really asked them for as much help as could did call the lead mom this morning and left her pretty much incoherent sobbing message begging for help hope she calls me back nope gramma is it he has half sister that lives in another state his parents are dead his friends are useless great to hang out on weekend just not down to help with anything else assholes know the neighbors but not the closest with most of them the only two that would be willing to help are disabled themselves sort of having the kids do what they can within their capacity my daughter is doing as much as she can including sorting laundry sweeping mopping you name it the other kids are trying but there are some days where just lose my seven year old entirely to what going on inside his head and he my other big helper so those days are awfully tough and jack and coke hold the coke haha yes ll look into the crockpot thing try to use it somewhat sparingly think my year old has grudge against the crockpot he wo eat anything that comes out of it but he just going to have to suck it up unfortunately no he was in the hospital for nearly week and we called every person that he knows not damn one of them is willing to do more than stop by to visit which in the end means that actually have more work to do when they leave the kids are helping as much as they can but sadly there are days that my year old is pretty much out of it and days that my year old ca do much but sit on his nebulizer and try to breathe ve considered putting the business on hold but if did never get it back half of it is based on contracts and if lose those wo get them back trying to get my roommate onto medicaid because he has no income right now and if can get him on better insurance plan they will provide all the transport for his doctor appointments and that will take lot off of me right there thank you will look over there have one 10 year old daughter and she is incredibly capable your oldest probably kids are old enough to do many things around the house they might not do it perfectly or as good as you do but right now anything is better than nothing they can do their own laundry yes you might have to write instructions but you can do that once teach the oldest and let the oldest supervise the other two you can probably get them to wash the younger kids clothes too my daughter does her laundry all on her own with no supervision now it makes her feel responsible and it one less load of laundry need to do they can help with sweeping and dusting and cleaning windows and mirrors like said it wo be perfect but something is better than nothing food cook it week at time or half week at time do cook every day let your kids help you by having them assemble the ingredients for simple soup chopped carrots onions celery some kind of broth chopped up meat maybe some noodles prepare giant casserole dish like enchiladas can give you simplified recipe lasagna or crock pot goodies like chili pot roast or stews make lots of simple hearty food that will last few days reheat on the stove or in the microwave as needed bonus have hot mug of soup at lunch ask your friends directly for help tell them all you need is for them to come help wash towels run the vacuum or referee bath time for the kids it school time can the kids visit with friends during the week ask other parents for help think there will be some generous souls out there family nearby jesus christ afraid to ask how many bedrooms you have how about and aupair or hard as they can it still going to take over week to get any kind of approval or denial on that if could get nurse just once day for an hour that would be all need to tip the scales back in my favor and at least get on top of some of the day to day stuff and know bitching but it just never stops the minute the kids are settled he needs something and know it not his fault do blame him what happened was freak accident that no one could have planned for or prevented and know he is under stress too but damn for 13 hours out of the day am the only functional adult even in the house shit this is so much harder than planned on it being unfortunately there just is anyone else to help him period the only other option is to let him lay there in his room and starve to death not something that could live with gramma is really that much work she is in assisted living so all really have to do is go to the store for her once week and calm her down over the phone when she gets panicky and forgets where she is wow you are the definition of super mom here am over here with month old who is pretty good baby and husband who works all 40 hours in days so he home lot my family also lives in honestly be bit harsher with those friends why would they step up when they know that you ll just do everything stop doing everything for everyone and you may actually get some help call them up and are all just ideas hope something from the following is helpful do not want to offend so if anything does work for you it just brainstorming ok even if you are not religious consider appealing for help to your local religious groups ie churches but also kiwanis lion club rotary also scouts or guides write short letter and send it email it to them with your contact info on it any of these groups might be able to visit you once do one task or send someone few times or whatever but at your level it is all of great benefit to you do you qualify for some kind of meal assistance program are there public health workers who can do temporary respite do you have some kind of government services office you can do your falling down on the floor of generating some sympathy votes kid but if there is such an office visiting might be worthwhile everything you do have to remember do use charts to track meds use timers to remind you to do things set alarms to tell you to get ready to go out if you have smartphone use the hell out of the reminders use checklist to make sure everyone gets their teeth and hair brushed school lunch and so on crockpot and once month freezer cooking when your helpful friend is around be 110 strict about bedtimes you all need sleep in this amount of stress do get yourself killed driving without enough sleep laundry everyone changes into their pj where the laundry baskets are they sort the laundry into baskets by colour label it it may allow you to train the 10 year old to do laundry yeah it may be more than you like to ask of the 10 year old but it well within her abilities crisis mode more laundry unless you require it for business purposes call the dry clean only and requires ironing stuff off limits for now pick out week of clothes at time and make sure everything there and ready to go or do the same in advance nightly to streamline your mornings use laundromat wash service to get caught up if you can afford it try doing one load of laundry per day in when you get home maybe or immediately when you wake up do know anything about special needs kids and can only say wish things were easier for everyone but do they have morning and night time routines can do they brush their own teeth you have to stop doing for them anything they could do themselves re kids and chores my mom would have us kids working on chores we did necessarily enjoy to do but needed to get done chipping mortar off bricks we were going to reuse as an example but everyone was doing what they could at their pace and in one place to supervise cleaning fly lady or unfuck your habitat try doing 15 minutes day of cleaning as your maximum with timer those who wo do anything see if you can get them to pick things up on the way over or when they do their own grocery runs or pharmacy runs if trustworthy tell them to bring meal when they visit these are easy and do involve any cleaning or bodily fluids so you can sometimes get the lazy or germaphobes to do these amazon prime for diapers and such automate your banking no idea if this works for you work at home work at office but consider setting aside say hour block of the work day without incoming phone calls or checking emails just for focusing on backlog do it in some order urgency age then move on to the needs of the day again hope none of it offends and something can help wish you well and hope when your bestie gets home she kicks some ass for you hang in there look into this website http onceamonthmeals com it has many special diet meal plans to look at if that need of yours more importantly the entire premise is cooking for month in single day and freezing it sometimes you have to adapt but if you marinade bunch of meat in advance and carefully flash freeze into bricks you can easily have three meals day in an apartment sized freezer you re nine so it might be more like two weeks but that still got ta help also do what others have suggested and contact your local churches my father travels constantly for work couple weeks here few months there for years he called ahead to the local churches regardless of denomination and found room and board we ve housed people from abusive situations in the middle of the night there almost certainly volunteers who help out with the older members of the congregation so they can just drop by to help you as part of their rotation do feel bad about asking for help when you need it you can always do what you can later when you re back on your feet if you feel you have debt roommate needs to figure out something for himself hire nurse or even just friend or coworker to babysit for himself who can help him out you have too much on your plate to do everything for him and upset for you that he expects you to do it put him on speaker phone with charity group or something and get them to help him out think you accidentally got on the shortcut to sainthood most of us avoid that road but sometimes people just get shoved onto it you ve gotten lots of good advice especially find help especially from religious organizations humanitarian organizations reddit helpers craigslist etc immediately get that medicare application in enlist the kiddos crock pot easy meals ll add you can do this keep up the business glad you re selling the custom car anything valuable like that now is the time to grab the value from it via selling it and use that value to help keep you all sane and afloat there will always be time and money later to replace those things not so your sanity you really can do this think of all the tsunami moms widows wives of absentee husbands moms in developing countries struggling with all their crap you guys are the true heroes of the world no one should be in your shoes but sometimes it *does* fall to one person to do so much and you *will* be able to find the strength it will really pass just get through it especially with help get that help since you re religious do pray with anything that works for you here is my favorite prayer use in times of difficulty gt god refresh and gladden my spirit purify my heart illumine my powers lay all my affairs in thy hand thou art my guide and my refuge will no longer be sorrowful and grieved will be happy and joyful being god will no longer be full of anxiety nor will let trouble harass me will not dwell on the unpleasant things of life gt god thou art more friend to me than am to myself dedicate myself to thee lord from the writings of the baha faith does he not have any family able to help him so he is so dependent on you how long is he expected to be out of commission is there church or community group such as the salvation army near by that can help there must be some kind of supports in your area if not the gov reach out you need it nobody at all the cast on the right arm will come off next thursday but he has to keep it wrapped until the surgical incisions totally heal his weight limit will be really low but he ll be able to use that arm again starting then his other arm will get the cast off the following week but the mechanical brace that he has on will have to stay for couple of months so that arm wo be useable once the casts come off he can feed himself and use the bathroom by himself he wo be able to do much more until he starts building some strength back up for anyone wondering he fell off the back of his truck dislocated both shoulders shattered both elbows dislocated both elbows broke the radius on both sides and the ulna on the left he had to have surgery on his right arm to put screws in the bone to hold it together as well as set the breaks he had to have surgery on the left to replace part of the elbow joint stabilize the bone and decompress the radius so they could set it properly oh and an additional surgery on the left to repair the ligament which was torn almost completely in half yes lds churches are great for that as social worker always loved it when clients connected with that church they late so either roommate can take nap for an hour while the older kids are in school for you to run and drop off or your husband can watch him for few minutes it not permanent fix but at least it to the congregation asking for help was going to say church groups for sure even if it one time deal it will help out lot going to try to answer the question you asked and not give you bunch of random advice like you have already thought of it things you can let slide most of the house cleaning as long as it not dangerous or going to make someone sick let it be leave the floors dusting windows stove top microwave bed making whatever you ll get to it when you can for now just make sure you have clothes to wear and functionally clean kitchen period sorting laundry nearly all colors can be washed together on cold with no adverse effects do worry about microsorting every color delicate water temp just throw it in and wash also if it ai dirty do clean it jeans can be worn for awhile before they are worthy of washing towels and washcloths can be hung up and reused few times do make more work for yourself squares day not saying do feed your kids just do prepare more than one meal per day stock fruit yogurt cheese nuts crackers pepperoni anything that can be eaten with little to no preparation and let them graze try to keep it healthy if possible but do beat yourself up over poptarts and bologna sandwiches you ll get their nutrition under control when you can for now they need you to be sane not june cleaver when you cook make sure it fast and easy and do you fret over paper plates let someone else save the planet you are in crisis management mode if it not necessary do do it one day things will be better and you can get back on track but for now you have to survive these might not be mom of the year tips but if you can get through this you deserve that trophy anyway just know that you can do this and the bad times ca last forever on side note your 10 year old can handle much more than you realize no daughter grows up wishing she had helped her mom less just let her know she your right hand woman and do come down on her if she drops the ball she will rise to the occasion and be your greatest ally the sense of responsibility and independence she gains from helping you during this time will carry her through life do sell her short she little woman ll plates etc they re godsend also op you are superwoman wish knew of way to help and mean that my house cleaning suffers ill damned if do take quiet bath after my daughter goes to bed the house can wait think the one in our neighborhood got little disgruntled when they realized we were going to be joining ever but still having the house clean for little while was so refreshing would contact churches community groups in your area let them know your situation and your needs people will help with time or money perhaps groups dedicated to causes that impact your family directly laundry maybe general guidelines to make sure that what ends up in the laundry is actually in need of laundering meals cook in bulk sure you do to some extent with that many people but whatever you make triple it quadruple it and freeze it stew chili lasagna etc eatcheapandhealthy is good for ideas cleaning strict rules on cleaning up there are too many people in your house to let things be put wherever someone wants them when you come into the house immediately put things away the opposite of when you get ready to leave and gather stuff up this one is more for the kids than you less clutter makes it easier to keep the house clean you have your plate full ask friends family church coworkers neighbors for hand they wo judge you if they know what you re dealing with seconded so sorry you re in this position my best recommendations are just parroting what others have already said really wish had shortcut for you on the dishes or laundry really do the only thing do know that might help big might because just do know what your schedule looks like is using the flylady minutes rule set timer for minutes and do task it can be just moving load of laundry it can be wiping down all the surfaces in the bathroom it can be doing whirlwind pickup of specific room or maybe the kitchen table or your desk but the principle is basically you can do anything in minutes when the timer goes off stop and move on with your day ok just read the website http www flylady net getting started and it actually the 15 minute rule but think we can do babysteps of minutes in your case lol have done 10 15 minute whirlwind tasks and it really is amazing when you view those things in smaller time increments instead of never going to get all this laundry done as well as feeling the freedom to stop when the timer
